content:
Jeff works as a waiter at a fancy restaurant. He receives a base amount of $\$70$ each day, plus  $\$10$ of tip for each client he serves. Assume $x$ represents the number of clients Jeff will serve in a day, and $y$ represents his daily salary.

**Draw the graph which represents Jeff's daily salary as a function of the number of clients he serves.**

[[â˜ƒ interactive-graph 1]]
